findings.details: On small screens the hero eyebrow badge feels slightly dense; minor spacing and size tuning would improve readability.

findings.result: No obvious broken links in templates
findings.details: Scanned layout and key pages; no placeholder or http:// links found.
Homepage avatar is lazy/low priority but still preloaded in the head; removing the preload avoids wasted early bandwidth.
Key pages include title/description/keywords in front matter.

recommendations: Refine hero eyebrow badge sizing/spacing on mobile for readability
Avoid preloading assets that are explicitly lazy-loaded
